node.name: pos - find or set the offset for the last/next m//g search
node.description: Returns the offset of where the last m//g search left off for the variable is in question ($_ is used when the variable is not specified). May be modified to change that offset. Such modification will also influence the \G zero-width assertion in regular expressions. See [perlman:perlre|the perlre manpage] and [perlman:perlop|the perlop manpage].
node.title: perlfunc:pos
